# apono_connector (Data Source)

Use this data source to get the Apono connector metadata.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "apono_connector" "prod_us" {
  id = "example-prod-us"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id` (String) Connector identifier

### Read-Only

- `name` (String) Connector name
